name: Pac-Eight
overview: Pac-Eight is a 1996 slot machine typed game in which you insert credits, then redeem them for bets. It is like a slot machine, like before. You got fruits and Pinky in the right field, in which things can happen, Dig Dug might appear and explode an item, Pookas switching the items, Fygars burning down items, or a Pac-Man might appear, in which only two sides, the player must pick the correct one. If not, the game ends. This game is the first to include all the characters in Dig Dug.
